content: With encouragement from @Grahame Grieve I have added X-Request-Id to the BasicAudit IG. One example where I exercise it is - http://build.fhir.org/ig/IHE/ITI.BasicAudit/branches/main/AuditEvent-ex-auditBasicQueryGetClient.html
note this model is different than the example in FHIR Core for TraceId, which defined an .entity of type "21" (Job), with an identifier.type of "TraceID"
I very much need critical review and comment. I am not hardly aware of TraceID or X-Request-Id.
